summary: This module implements Home Assistant sensor entities that integrate with USPS data to report the number of incoming mail items or the tracking status of individual packages. The sensors expose state, measurement units, icons, names, and additional attributes like delivery dates and attribution, and they periodically refresh their data from the USPS component.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to monitor USPS mail and package delivery status directly within their smart home system, facilitating automation and notifications based on postal service updates.
